title: Hillary Refers to Muslims as ‘Sand N*****s’ in WikiLeaks Dump?
subtitle: The term "sand n*****" does appear in e-mail sent by Hillary Clinton and published by Wikileaks, but the Democratic presidential nominee did not use the term herself to describe Muslims.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Hillary Clinton called Muslims "sand n*ggers" in an email leaked by Wikileaks.
